titles.title: Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2017
Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2017
A bill to reauthorize the Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp.
Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: This bill amends the Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Act of 2010 by requiring the U.S. Postal Service to make the stamp available to the public for at least 10 years rather than 6 years.
